mapper.select: SELECT health_comment_no,health_no,NVL(parent_health_comment_no,health_comment_no) as parent_health_comment_no,health_comment_contents,client_id,reg_date,up_date FROM hcomment WHERE health_no = #{health_no} ORDER BY parent_health_comment_no asc, health_comment_no asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hcomment(health_no, health_comment_no,parent_health_comment_no, health_comment_contents,client_id, reg_date, up_date) VALUES (#{health_no}, hcomment_seq.nextval, #{parent_health_comment_no,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{health_comment_contents}, #{client_id}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: select health_title, health_comment_no, client_id, health_comment_contents from health h join hcomment hc on h.health_no = hc.health_no
